text.section: A restaurant with an outdoor dining area may allow a patron's dog to accompany the patron in the outdoor dining area during the hours designated by the owner of the restaurant.
This section does not affect the right of an individual to use a service animal, as defined in § 7-701 of the Human Services Article.
